ingredients.item: 6 slices essential Waitrose British Smoked Back Bacon

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7.

Parboil the potatoes in boiling water for 10 minutes, drain and transfer to a roasting tin. Crush the potatoes lightly with a masher. Add the oil, garlic and rosemary, and stir to coat the potatoes evenly. Season. Roast for20 minutes until crispy and golden.
Meanwhile, place the bacon under a preheated grill for 5 minutes, turning once until crispy. Then slice and set aside.
Toss the salad in the dressing with the bacon and warm potatoes to coat evenly.
